hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"The Prophet prohibited Salat from being performed in seven places: the dung heap, the slaughtering area, the graveyard, the commonly used road, the wash area, in the area that camels rest at, and above the House of Allah (the Ka'bah)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ مَا يُصَلَّى إِلَيْهِ وَفِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What Is Disliked To Face While Performing Salat, Or To Perform Salat In
